name: Swift Design Patterns
description: In this workshop you'll get hands-on examples of the most important patterns available to Swift developers, so you can try using them, re-using them, and refactoring them into your own work.

name: Build your first Android app!
description: Have you ever wondered how to write an Android app? Is it as easy as some people say? Letâ€™s find out together at this workshop organized by Women Techmakers Latvia! In this event we will learn about basic parts that make up any Android app, learn some Kotlin - official and awesome programming language for Android development, create a simple note taking app to have hands-on experience. Programming experience is not required, but it will be an advantage.
